content: wrangling to hold everything in the right place keep at it and you ll develop a technique tip this is somewhat forgiving in that the slip stitches allow for the bead strand yarn to slide don t worry if your slip_stitch isn t snug to the first or third bead slide the sl sts and beads into the chain 3 curve and everything will sit just fine as long as your slip stitches are on either end of the set of beads you can also gently pull on the bead strand yarn at any point to cinch everything up but do make sure that 1 your sl sts are tight on the bead strand - they do not count as a stitch and we really don t want to see them and 2 each of your chain stitches have even gauge throughout set of three beads enclosed by a slip_stitch chain 3 slip_stitch base construction step 3 chain 3 slide the next set of 3 beads up and slip_stitch around the bead strand after the third bead in the set repeat base construction step 3 until you have enclosed each set of beads within a slip_stitch chain 3 slip_stitch at this point you can gently pull on the bead strand yarn and slide everything snug and in place but not too tight - you want everything to lay flat and not bunch up take a moment to measure here undo any sl sts and chain 3s that might be too many slide away any extra beads and redo the slip_stitch you can return these extra beads to your stash in the next step after 5 repeats in base construction step 3 the perlina beaded bracelet copyright © june 2022 4 all sets of beads are enclosed at the end of base construction step 3 around the end chain 1 after last slip_stitch from base construction step 3 rotating around the end of the piece the bead strand yarn may loosen up here it s okay remember you can gently tug on it and cinch everything into place slip_stitch around the yarn strand just before the first bead on this opposite side right next to the slip_stitch that is already there remember to make your sl sts tight now you will work the same as base construction step 3 along this side of the beads to fully enclose them base construction step 4 chain 3 slip_stitch around the bead strand after the third bead in the first set the first slip_stitch chain 3 slip_stitch on the opposite side of the base construction base construction step 5 chain 3 slip_stitch around the bead strand after the third bead in the next set repeat this until all sets of beads are enclosed remember to gently pull on the bead strand yarn to snug everything into place the perlina beaded bracelet copyright © june 2022 5 after 5 repeats in base construction step 5 end of base construction step 5 -
